text:
@FLOTUS Empty words from an empty head.
Your owner, who is inciting people to kill themselves by drinking bleach and disinfectant, while continuing to incompetently handle the #CoronavirusPandemic , has not yet offered one word of sympathy to families of the deceased ! 52k DEAD!!
